Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin | Reigate and Banstead
Key Strengths: Directly related to the request for council customer information
Includes an option to report a missed bin
Recommendations.Reasoning: Item 1 provides a straight-forward method for reporting missed bins, which is clearly stated in both the title and snippet. The site seems to be an official council page due to its precise information and format.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin - My Reigate and Banstead
Key Strengths: Directly related to the request for council customer information
Allows users to report missed bins using their My Reigate and Banstead account
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though the structure and layout may be slightly different compared to Item 1, this result still pertains to reporting a missed bin. Its placement in the search results (second spot) indicates its relevance.

Recommendations.Title: Report it | Reigate and Banstead
Key Strengths: Directly related to the request for council customer information
Offers multiple report options, including missed bins
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not explicitly stating 'missed bin', the Report-it page offers various services and missed bin is one of those. The title and snippet are also relevant to customer information.

Recommendations.Title: Household bin collections | Reigate and Banstead
Key Strengths: Relates to household waste, which is a subcategory of customer information
Recommendations.Reasoning: Though not exactly pertaining to reporting a missed bin, this result offers information on household collections, which can provide relevant context for customers.

Recommendations.Title: Contact us | Reigate and Banstead
Key Strengths: A broad category that includes missed bin reporting options
Recommendations.Reasoning: The contact us page doesn't explicitly state missed bin reporting, but it can connect customers to relevant municipal resources.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: Google search results were used as a source for council customer information. Due to the nature of web searches, not all information may be directly related to the given criteria; however, items that offer adjacent relevance have been included for context and potential convenience.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The top results (Items 1-3) provide direct, simplified access to missing bin reporting. Results 4-5 offer less obvious paths towards customer information, but may still provide helpful resources for users.
